passage_text: Family Dollar Salary. Family Dollar average salary is $68,898, median salary is $69,290 with a salary range from $47,000 to $105,040. Family Dollar salaries are collected from government agencies and companies. Each salary is associated with a real job position

Average Family Dollar Distribution Center Salaries. The average salary for family dollar distribution center jobs is $137,000. Average family dollar distribution center salaries can vary greatly due to company, location, industry, experience and benefits. This salary was calculated using the average salary for all jobs with the term family dollar distribution center anywhere in the job listing. The family dollar distribution center salary comparisons feature allows job seekers to get the information required to make important career decisions and negotiate salary ranges. The average Family Dollar salary ranges from approximately $15,000 per year for Customer Service Associate / Cashier to $94,000 per year for Area Manager. Salary information comes from 3,553 data points collected directly from employees, users, and jobs on Indeed.
